attributes.additional_details:
That anyone standing for Parliament or for nomination to the Lords and similar positions in devolved bodies be required to

    - provide fully audited tax details for the preceding 5 years and that they continue to submit such details each year for public scrutiny

    - be required to submit in a publicy accessible format any claims for reimbursement of expenses PRIOR to their being reimbursed

    - be totally prohibited from accepting money, directly or indirectly from any source whatsoever for whatever reason, including electioneering, unless prior clearance and the publication thereof, from a responsible body, has been received
